name: Blossoming Love (demo)
description:
BLOSSOMING ❀ LOVE is a slice of life visual novel demo made for Yuri Jam 2015!

Ivy has been a shy wallflower all her life, and the discovery she's capable of magic has made her decide to take the first steps in changing her life around. Having just been accepted to Lirio Academy, Ivy takes the first steps towards blooming into a more confident person...but could love possibly be in the cards as well?

The game features 3 romanceable girls - and a secret, if you can find it! ♥

The demo has 6 different endings.

Character art by Kris

Writing by Cathy

Further credits are located in the credits.txt file!

Please keep in mind that this is a demo, and that not everything is finalized quite yet!

(Also if you run into issues, please contact Cathy!)
